explanation: Jonas claims he stayed home all evening and never returned to the museum. But Clue 3 reveals the delivery driver left food at his door with no answer at 8:31 PM, meaning Jonas was not home as he claimed. Clue 1 shows his keycard was used to open the display case at 11:47 PM, and Clue 2 shows a figure matching his build entering and leaving the museum with a large bag. Jonas lied about being home all night to cover his theft of the vase.
funFact: Athenian red-figure vases are among the most commonly looted antiquities, with an estimated 90% of those on the market having undocumented provenance.
